issue.title: Unable to connect to remote graph
issue.body:
Connecting to a local graph works fine. 

When connecting to a remote graph, it's not possible to select any node labels from NeoMap. Any queries results in the error:

> Invalid cypher query.
> Fix your query and try again
> 
> Neo4jError: Unsupported authentication token, missing key \`credentials\`

The remote server is using a different port than 7687 for bolt, but the correct port is used in the connect URL. The active remote connection opens in the Neo4j Desktop and works fine.

issue.title: Bug fix
Test layer
issue.body:
- Test handle* methods
- Test fields are displayed when then need to (depending on layer state)

issue.title: Use APOC to get list of available nodes and properties
Don't change zoom / position of the map on update
issue.body:
It always centers back to 0,0

What would be useful is to do a zoom to fit, .e.g to a bounding box that shows all markers/points.

issue.title: Use the same drop-down for properties as for the label.
issue.body:
For all 3 lat, lon, tooltip

Either just by calling: `call dbms.propertyKeys()`

Or if you want to go more fancy to only show keys by default that are in your label.

```
MATCH (n:$label) 
WITH n LIMIT 100 
UNWIND keys(n) as key
RETURN distinct key

```

issue.title: The popup for the LIMIT is a bit annoying
issue.body:
I would just render a red text/note below or above the field if it really exceeds 10k.

The popup even came up when I was about to reduce the number, so it's confusing for users.

issue.title: Simplify simple layer query
issue.body:
```
MATCH (n) 
WHERE (n:$label) AND exists(n.$latitude) and exists(n.$longitude)
RETURN n.$latitude as latitude, n.longitude as longitude, n.$name as tooltip 
LIMIT 200000
```

issue.title: Add a release-notes.md to the package
issue.body:
So that users see what the latest relevant changes are.

see as an example 

https://github.com/neo4j-apps/neuler/blob/master/release-notes.md

issue.title: Simple layer lost the tooltip field
issue.body:
So it's no longer possible to configure the tooltip property.

And it auto-generates "name" which will lead to a lot of "null" values being transfers if it's not there.

Bug fix
Bug fix
